source.64ed22c3:
df = pd.DataFrame()
for i in os.listdir('../input/5th-datarobot-academy/'):
    sub = pd.read_csv('../input/5th-datarobot-academy/'+i)['price']
    df = pd.concat([df,sub],axis=1)
    name = i.split('.')[0]
    df.rename(columns={'price':name},inplace=True)
source.7a20653a:
import seaborn as sns
corr = df.corr()
plt.figure(figsize=(20,20))
sns.heatmap(corr, 
           cmap="Blues", linewidths=2,square=True,
           annot=True, fmt=".2f")
plt.show()
source.c20fbb0f:
Shumpei_Ujiyama = pd.read_csv('../input/5th-datarobot-academy/Shumpei_Ujiyama.csv')
Nobuyuki_Kawamata = pd.read_csv('../input/5th-datarobot-academy/Nobuyuki_Kawamata.csv')
Kataoka_Kengo = pd.read_csv('../input/5th-datarobot-academy/Kataoka_Kengo.csv')
ensemble = Shumpei_Ujiyama.copy()
ensemble['Shumpei_Ujiyama'] = ensemble['price']
ensemble['Nobuyuki_Kawamata'] = Nobuyuki_Kawamata['price']
ensemble['Kataoka_Kengo'] = Kataoka_Kengo['price']
ensemble['price'] = ensemble['Shumpei_Ujiyama']*0.5 + ensemble['Nobuyuki_Kawamata']*0.3 + ensemble['Kataoka_Kengo']*0.2
ensemble[['id','price']].to_csv('submission.csv',index=False)
